schedule.title: Set a schedule
schedule.description: Set the job schedule to run dns validation for certificate renew.

backoffLimit.title: Set a backoff limit
backoffLimit.description: Specify the number of retries before considering a job as failed.

debug.title: Enable debug mode
debug.description: Display more logs when value is set to `true`

activeDeadlineSeconds.title: Set an active deadline seconds
activeDeadlineSeconds.description: Set an active deadline for terminatting a job.

ttlSecondsAfterFinished.title: Set a TTL for cleaning a job
ttlSecondsAfterFinished.description: Set a TTL for cleaning a job.

successfulJobsHistoryLimit.title: Set a limit for successful jobs history
successfulJobsHistoryLimit.description: Specify how many completed jobs should be kept.

failedJobsHistoryLimit.title: Set a limit for failed jobs history
failedJobsHistoryLimit.description: Specify how many failed jobs should be kept.

manageAllNamespaces.title: Manage all namespaces
manageAllNamespaces.description: Whether or not `certs` should manage all namespaces for generating certificates.
